import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

S=set(input().strip())
N=len(S)
m=max(S)

def main():
	for i in range(m):
		if S.discard(S[i]):
			N-=1
			break

	if N<=0:
		print(-1)
		return

	L=N//2
	ans=L+1
	S=set(S)

	for i in range(L+1):
		if S=={S[i]}:
			ans-=1
			break

		if S.intersection(S[i+1:]):
			ans-=1
			break

	print(ans)
	return

main()
